DOC.brief_summary: Major abdominal surgeries are associated with perioperative cardiac morbidity of up to 10%. Ischemic preconditioning may have a protective effect. The purpose of this study is to find out remote ischemic conditioning by inflating a blood pressure cuff on the arm will have a protective effect.
DOC.brief_title: Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Before Abdominal Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing abdominal surgery:large bowel, pancreatic and hepatic surgery Chronic inflammatory disease. Glyburide use before surgery.
